chapters.title: Prologue: Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info: Javindhra Doraille, p. 49—Sitter for the Red Ajah and leader of six Red sisters who found Logain in Cosamelle about a year before he proclaimed himself. Logain claims she and her group persuaded him to become a false Dragon. She is among those who kidnapped Egwene.
